reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Slaugham is a small hamlet near Haywards Heath and is predominantly made up of a church and period cottages and houses along with the Chequers Pub
reviews.title: Great food, peace and tranquility

likes.liked: — Large spacious room, elegantly decorated and very comfortable bed.
likes.disliked: — So quiet that the fan in the bathroom was the loudest thing you could hear !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The building looked lovely as we turned off the main road and into the hamlet. Once inside there were plenty of comfy sofas to sit on, several rooms make up the pub, with a tidy garden to the rear overlooking farmland and the woods beyond.
reviews.title: Most comfortable beds ever!

reviews.text: Non existent bar service. Filthy bar top. Undrinkable wines. Appalling wines.
reviews.title: Gone dramatically downhill

reviews.text: When I paid the bill (approx £45.00), I left £50.00. No change was offered.
reviews.title: Surly service....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It wasn't worth the argument. I'm not going back.
reviews.title: Had a great time!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Asked for a bar snack on a Sunday at 12pm, and despite a snack menu on the bar, surly unhelpful female staff just not interested.... Eventually found a man who took pity and rustled us up a sandwich.
reviews.title: £14 for a poor roast dinner, absolutely disgraceful!

reviews.text: Apparently changed hands recently, seemingly not for the better! Dreadful attitude.
reviews.title: What a find!

likes.liked: — Relaxed atmosphere, good food and accommodation, location, value

reviews.text: One of our regulars for lunch - we feel has survived the change in ownership. Have always found staff helpful - never met the reportedly surly staff! Our 4 year old loves the food - and the staff happy to vary the meal to include her favourite side orders.
reviews.title: Good standard of food

reviews.text: It seems to me that people only review the Chequers when they have something negative to say!
reviews.title: many a lovely meal eaten here!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I thoroughly enjoy dining at the Chequers. The village of Slaugham itself is beautiful, and the view from the conservatory in the pub is lovely on a sunny day.
reviews.title: AVOID, SURLY STAFF WITH ATTITUDE PROBLEMS, HORRID FOOD, GONE DOWNHILL.

reviews.text: Service is sometimes a little slow but the food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: is worth the wait! The staff are friendly and helpful - we certainly haven't encountered a 'Miss Surly' from one of the previous reviews!!
